programme.desc: Estranged siblings Qin Feng, Liu Tian Ye & Wen Jiang Yan reunite in a crisis, forced to choose between family, trust and truth. As Director Ye Tian You arrives, a final battle of good and evil erupts.

programme.title: Fox Demon Legend
programme.desc: Girls vanish in a remote village. Li Chang Xiao hunts for his missing disciple Luo Shui, uncovering fox legends, deadly secrets and a dark twisting conspiracy.

programme.desc: Based on the legendary life of Macau’s first-generation business leader, Ho Yin, as he navigates through a turbulent era fraught with competing forces & engage in high-stakes financial battles.
